channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google Notebook Rolls Out Lecture Mode With British Flair
item.description: NotebookLM’s audio overviews evolved into interactive podcasts and upcoming lecture mode, expanding passive learning possibilities.

item.title: Why All I Want For Christmas Is A Dolby Atmos-Equipped Polestar 3
item.description: Dolby Atmos inside a car is a transformative experience and thanks to Polestar your favorite Christmas songs have now been optimised for the format.

item.title: Are You Having A Sad Christmas? Here Are 12 Reasons It May Be Bad
item.description: If you are having a sad "Blue Christmas" or a bad December holiday season in any other way, you are not alone. There are 12 reasons why this may be th...

item.title: Google To Let Users Change Gmail Address — What You Need To Know
item.description: A Google support document has revealed that Gmail users will soon be able to change their @gmail.com email address.

item.title: Elon Musk Is Playing A Different Entrepreneurial Game
item.description: Elon Musk’s edge isn’t cars or rockets. It’s Starlink—a global communications network reshaping telecom economics and redefining entrepreneurial scale...

item.title: Popular new ideas

item.title: Random access

item.title: Timing your overnight success
